title: Quinoa and mushroom stuffing
ingredients: ['170g quinoa, rinsed', '475ml water', '1 onion, chopped', '450g fresh mushrooms, sliced', '2 apples, peeled, cored and chopped', '4 tablespoons pine nuts', '50g raisins', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons chicken seasoning']
